description: No Christmas is complete without a trifle and this one takes the cake! Fill a banana bread loaf with custard then top with cream, jelly cubes and fresh fruit.
name: Fruitsalad Trifle Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using an electric mixer, beat cream in a large bowl until firm peaks form. Top cake with cream. Decorate with grapes, blackberries, mango and jelly cubes. Serve.
